title: Matteo Manente
text:
I am a Licensed Psychologist and a PhD Candidate in Psychological Sciences at the University of Padova.
I am also a member of the Psicostat research group, where we try to make sense of psychological data.
My work sits at the intersection of clinical psychology and quantitative methodology.
Currently, I am working on the development and application of Inferential Multiverse Meta-analysis. My goal is to investigate the robustness of the efficacy of psychotherapies, moving beyond simple effect sizes to understand how analytical choices shape scientific conclusions.

title: Matteo Manente
text:
Research Interests


Statistics: Meta-analysis, Multiverse analysis, Permutation-based Inferential methods
Clinical Psychology: Psychotherapy efficacy, Clinical trial methodology
Open Science: Research Replicability, Philosophy of Science
